A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: TLJ is an extremely entertaining film packed with stunning effects\, emotion\, great acting\, and battle sequences you should expect. It is not without its flaws though; the first act is a bit messy\, part of the story arc (including a couple of character events such as Leia’s) seemed strange\, and some CGI scenes were unnecessary to me. Otherwise this film is fantastic.
